mapper.sql: ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, BATCHESSEQ, ISFINAL,PEOPELCASEID,SFCNUMBER,ARCHIVETYPE,ARCHIVENAME,ARCHIVESFCID,AUTHORID
mapper.insert:
select seq_FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ_id.nextval from dual
insert into FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ
ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, PEOPELCASEID, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, SFCNUMBER, ARCHIVETYPE, ARCHIVENAME, ARCHIVESFCID, AUTHORID,
BATCHESSEQ,
ISFINAL,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peopelcaseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archivesfcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{authorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{batchesseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isfinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ
SCBJ = #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIDCARD = #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCHESSEQ = #{batchesseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISFINAL = #{isfinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select nvl(max(BATCHESSEQ),0) from FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ where scbj=0 and PEOPELCASEID=#{peopelcaseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
